description: Discover how SuperRare is transforming digital art license compliance using blockchain technology. Learn about the benefits of blockchain for artist royalties, ownership tracking, and global access, while addressing legal and technical challenges in the digital art market.
keywords: SuperRare, blockchain, digital art, license compliance, smart contracts, royalties, art marketplace, provenance, digital asset ownership, blockchain technology
title: Exploring SuperRare and Blockchain-Based License Compliance
